ygData.subject: Re: siphon strength
ygData.msgSnippet: nope, sorry, it is not cumulative. but i usually keep casting it until the magic skill that is used to cast the spell is maxed out. then I cast it once a
ygData.messageBody:
nope, sorry, it is not cumulative. but i usually keep casting it until the
magic skill that is used to cast the spell is maxed out. then I cast it
once a target

----------
From: Mike <mikekb@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] siphon strength
Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 2:44 PM

Does anyone know for sure whether siphon strength is cumulative to the
target? Everytime you use it, it says the target weakens. So, does it
help to keep casting it?

- Saron, lvl 10 Human SK on Karana
